title: tikv failed at bootstrap complaining wal corruption
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->

Run EBS snapshot backup and restore TiKV from the snapshot 

### What did you expect?

Restored TiKV can recover successfully

### What did happened?

TiKV falls into crashloop with rocksdb complaining with message of `failed to create kv engine: Storage Engine Corruption: SST file is ahead of WALs `
